title.rendered: Trade fairs in 2021 – a summary of business events

content.rendered:
The 2021 trade fairs season has come up to the end for Bluefilters Professional. This has been a fruitful time, during which we have explored new business opportunities, and established a few promising partnerships.

We have promoted Bluefilters Professional water treatment solutions during three major sector events:

  • the Big 5 in Dubai
  • HOGA in Germany
  • Aquatech in Amsterdam

It was great to host you all during these events. Hopefully, we will meet next time to discuss business innovations.

We are curious about what 2022 will bring to business events and exhibitions. Watch the ‘news’ space for our updated trade fair schedule.

HOGA Germany 2021
Aquatech Amsterdam 2021
Big 5 Dubai
